availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William W. Smith (Eddyville, Lyon County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Georgianna Mims Smith in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 28, 1850. Father of Wiley C. Smith, Hanson R. Smith, Strother J. Smith, Effie A. Smith, Guy Smith, and R. C. Smith. Physician in Hickman County in 1850. Physician in Eddyville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 32A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville, p. 763.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, Eddyville/District 1, p. 17B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644, p. 315.
